review: Just as others say, easy to set up. Netflix displays much better (and with more controls) on Fire TV Stick than on Apple TV. The on screen menus are easy to navigate, and I like that I can search and queue up what I want to watch through an app on phone/tablet. However, little if any reason to choose it over competing products but for watching Prime Instant Video on the TV, which is why I bought it.
author: A. Lawyer
